item.title: Foodbot Poster at PervasiveHealth 2020
item.description: Our chatbot for just-in-time (JIT) healthy eating interventions was accepted as a poster at EAI PervasiveHealth 2020.

item.title: Demo at The Web Conference 2020
item.description:
Our pre-trained transformer-based recipe generation demo, RecipeGPT, was accepted to the demo track at The Web Conference.

Credit to Helena Lee and Ke Shu for putting together a web prototype in such a short period of time!

item.title: Publications Round-Up for 2019
item.description:
Here’s ther round-up of published papers so far this year.

  • FoodAI paper was accepted to KDD 2019 Applied Data Sceince Track.
  • Two papers on food recommendation and recipes' glycemic impact prediction were accepted to Digital Public Health (DPH 2019).
